title: Global basketball shoe sales 2012 - 2013 , by NBA player
summary: This grouped bar chart shows SOME LABEL on the Y-axis for 5 different Quarters for 2 groups 2012, and 2013 that are presented on the X-axis.
Over the 5 Quarters, the SOME LABEL for both 2013 and 2012 have decreased.
In Quarter Michael Jordan, 2013 had the highest SOME LABEL 2500.0 among the 2 groups and in Kevin Durant, 2012 had the lowest SOME LABEL 35.0.
In Quarter Michael Jordan, 2013 had the highest SOME LABEL among all 5 Quarters and it has the lowest SOME LABEL in Quarter Derrick Rose.

Over the 5 Quarters, the SOME LABEL for both 2013 and 2012 have decreased.

max_summary: This grouped bar chart shows SOME LABEL on the Y-axis for 5 different Quarters for 2 groups 2012, and 2013 that are presented on the X-axis.
All through the Quarters, similar trend was observed for 2013 and 2012. In both cases, the SOME LABEL have decreased.
Out of all 2 groups, 2013 had the highest SOME LABEL in Quarter Michael Jordan and 2012 had the lowest SOME LABEL in Quarter Kevin Durant.
In Quarter Michael Jordan, 2013 had the highest SOME LABEL among all 5 Quarters and it has the lowest SOME LABEL in Quarter Derrick Rose.
The maximum SOME LABEL for 2013 that was found in Quarter Michael Jordan was 62.5 times larger than the minimum SOME LABEL observed in Quarter Derrick Rose.
Among the groups, 2012 had the biggest difference in SOME LABEL. Where the maximum SOME LABEL was 57.14 times larger than the minimum SOME LABEL.
Averaging all 2 groups 2012, and 2013, the Quarter Michael Jordan is the maximum SOME LABEL and Derrick Rose is the minimum SOME LABEL.
